dataTypes.name: domain
dataTypes.description: Stores unique domain names 'up to one dot before the TLD', with visit counts and serialzed array of encountered trackers

dataTypes.name: url
dataTypes.description: Stores full visited url, togeter with serialzed arrays of detected trackers, and dother XDRs, title, domain name

dataTypes.name: tracker
dataTypes.description: Stores each trackers url, owner, owners url and serialized array of tracked domains

dataTypes.name: otherXDRs
dataTypes.description: Stores each XDRs url, owner, owners url and serialized array of tracked domains
